custom-sql.sql: select count(*) as COUNT_VALUE from xcolab_PlanVote inner join ( select distinct (PlanMeta.planId) as planId from PlanMeta where PlanMeta.planTypeId=?) as temp on temp.planId = PlanVote.planId;

select pi.* from xcolab_PlanItem pi inner join xcolab_PlanMeta pm on pi.planId = pm.planId INNER JOIN Users_Groups ug ON pm.planGroupId = ug.groupId INNER JOIN ( select planId, max(version) as v from xcolab_PlanItem group by planId ) v on pi.planId = v.planId and v.v = pi.version and ug.userId = ?

SELECT xcolab_PlanItem.* FROM xcolab_PlanItem INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(xcolab_PlanItem.id_) as itemId, xcolab_PlanItem.planId planId FROM xcolab_PlanItem GROUP BY xcolab_PlanItem.planId ) as t2 ON (xcolab_PlanItem.id_ = t2.itemId) WHERE xcolab_PlanItem.state = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT xcolab_PlanItem.* FROM xcolab_PlanItem INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(xcolab_PlanItem.id_) as itemId, xcolab_PlanItem.planId planId FROM xcolab_PlanItem GROUP BY xcolab_PlanItem.planId ) as t2 ON (xcolab_PlanItem.id_ = t2.itemId), xcolab_PlanMeta pm WHERE xcolab_PlanItem.state_ = 'ACTIVE' AND (pm.contestPhase = ?) AND pm.planId = xcolab_PlanItem.planId
GROUP BY pm.planId ORDER BY xcolab_PlanItem.id_ DESC

DELETE xcolab_PlanItem, xcolab_PlanDescription, xcolab_PlanMeta, xcolab_PlanModelRun FROM xcolab_PlanModelRun, xcolab_PlanMeta, xcolab_PlanItem, xcolab_PlanDescription WHERE xcolab_PlanItem.planId = xcolab_PlanDescription.planId AND xcolab_PlanItem.planId = xcolab_PlanMeta.planId AND xcolab_PlanItem.planId = xcolab_PlanModelRun.planId AND xcolab_PlanItem.planId = ?

SELECT xcolab_PlanItem.*, PLAN_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_PLACEHOLDER FROM xcolab_PlanItem INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(xcolab_PlanItem.id_) as itemId, xcolab_PlanItem.planId planId FROM xcolab_PlanItem GROUP BY xcolab_PlanItem.planId ) as t2 ON (xcolab_PlanItem.id_ = t2.itemId) INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(xcolab_PlanMeta.id_) as metaId, xcolab_PlanMeta.planId planId, xcolab_PlanMeta.planTypeId FROM xcolab_PlanMeta GROUP BY xcolab_PlanMeta.planId ) as t3 ON (xcolab_PlanItem.planId = t3.planId) PLAN_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_PLACEHOLDER WHERE t3.planTypeId = ? ORDER BY SORT_COLUMNS_PLACEHOLDER

SELECT xcolab_PlanItem.*, PLAN_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_PLACEHOLDER FROM xcolab_PlanItem INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(xcolab_PlanItem.id_) as itemId, xcolab_PlanItem.planId planId FROM xcolab_PlanItem GROUP BY xcolab_PlanItem.planId ) as t2 ON (xcolab_PlanItem.id_ = t2.itemId) INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(xcolab_PlanMeta.id_) as metaId, xcolab_PlanMeta.planId planId, xcolab_PlanMeta.planTypeId FROM xcolab_PlanMeta GROUP BY xcolab_PlanMeta.planId ) as t3 ON (xcolab_PlanItem.planId = t3.planId) LEFT JOIN xcolab_PlanType ON (t3.planTypeId = xcolab_PlanType.planTypeId) PLAN_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_PLACEHOLDER,
(SELECT COUNT(*) AS countAll FROM xcolab_PlanVote) AS Votes WHERE t3.planTypeId = ? ORDER BY SORT_COLUMNS_PLACEHOLDER
